document.full_text: the u.n. human rights chief on friday called for an independent investigation into the deaths of 34 people at an iranian dissident camp in iraq after iraqi security forces moved against it last week.
document.title: u.n. rights chief urges probe of deaths at iraqi camp
lines_and_colors: the u.n. human rights chief on friday called for an independent investigation into the deaths of 34 people at an iranian dissident camp in iraq after iraqi security forces moved against it last week.
